caption: Food was made fresh and very good.  We had a Hot Chick (buffalo chicken sandwich) and Cowboy Burger.  The service was polite and good.  Will definitely visit again.
They CAN NOT get their orders right.  So many times my son has received a hamburger with cheese.  HE HATES CHEESE, but obviously, you guys don't care:( It is too bad because the food is so good:(

Considering COVID and we cannot dine in, one can only assume they are not as busy as they would be if they had dine-in, carry-out and delivery. That would lead me to believe that they would get orders correct more often than not.  I have only ordered from here twice and both of my orders were wrong.  The first one, I ordered 2 fry dippers for .75 each and I did not receive them. Even though that is only $1.50, the cost is not the issue. The issue is I ordered something and didn't receive it. My first order total was over $55.  This second one, I ordered one of the burgers without ketchup and lettuce. GUESS WHAT, it came with ketchup and lettuce. I also requested that the fries be well done, more on the crispy side as the fries were soggy last time. GUESS WHAT, soggy again. This order was over $30.  Why put a notes section for each item if it it going to be ignored?  Totally unhappy with the service. The bacon cheese burger simply tastes like a regular McDonalds burger, just way more expensive. I have spent almost $100 on BURGERS and my orders haven't come correctly.  This place is totally not worth the price! "Wild Goat" sounds like it would be a gourmet burger joint and the pricing reflects a gourmet burger...that's what I expect! Save your cash and just go to Mickey D's.
